AI Description: Homopolish is a tool for polishing long-read assemblies using shorter reads. It takes long reads from a genome assembly and error-corrects them using short reads to produce a more accurate assembly.
Core Features: Error Correction Of Long-Read Assemblies Using Short Reads, Improving The Accuracy Of Genome Assemblies, Facilitates The Generation Of High-Quality Genome Assemblies
General Tags: Bioinformatics, Genome Assembly, Error Correction, Long Reads, Short Reads
